ygData.subject: Re: Lavastorm
ygData.msgSnippet: With my crappy fire save (14 with 2 rings of fire protection) Lavastorm has a large heal time. Plus the trains to the zones by people that fight in the path
ygData.messageBody:
With my crappy fire save (14 with 2 rings of fire
protection) Lavastorm has a large heal time. Plus the
trains to the zones by people that fight in the path
that the Imps and Elementals wander, is enough to drive
you nuts. I noticed that a ele or imp or drake wanders
just outside the doors of Najena from the valley on the
right to the valley on the left 20 minutes after
fighting in that area.
I have faught there quite a bit. Loot is great, when it
is dropped. ;) Is how I got the guild jeweler all his
starting materials until those stones became trivial. I
still give them to him to sell so he can buy the stones
he needs. He has a better charisma than me. ;) Suprise.
Thanks for the adbise though. I am just bored with the
zones I tend to fight in. Halas would be gret, but the
trek from Qeynos would drive me nuts, especially through
BB. BB may be fun, but I'm afraid it would be like
another Splitpaw. Plus to get there alive would be a
venture in itself.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
15th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."



>From: Chip Paul <cpaul@...>
>
>rich.hitz@... wrote:
>
>> Where besides Commonlands Oasis and Ro would be a good
>> place for a 15th level SK to get to/adventure solo while
>> looking for a group? KoS is a big factor here. :)
>>
>
>Lavastorm maybe?
>
>Xilith
